results.title: The Silent epidemic
results.creator_credit: David Mills and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
Alzheimer’s Disease is a fatal illness few people have heard of, yet as many as one in twelve old people in Britain are likely to contract it and thousands of young people also suffer from it. The fact that its symptoms - confusion, loss of memory, aggression and incontinence - are similar to those of old age has allowed it to be largely ignored by the medical profession.
results.description:

results.title: The Last refuge
results.creator_credit: Michael Beckham and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
Examines Paraguay under the Stroessner regime emphasising the regime’s corruption, use of torture and repression, and asylum for some of the world’s most wanted men. Exposes a number of personalities including ex-Nazi Adolf Mengele.

results.title: The Man who stole Uganda
results.creator_credit: John Sheppard and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
Uganda’s General Milton Obote was deposed by his own army. It took Major General Idi Amin, self-appointed Head of Army and State, just one week to take charge of key services and installations. Behind this well-organised takeover lies a history of military corruption.
results.description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.

results.title: Do you mind if I smoke?
results.creator_credit: Sue Woodford and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
Investigates the dangers of passive smoking, ie the smoke inhaled by a non-smoker from cigarettes left burning in an ashtray or in someone’s hand. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
results.description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.

results.title: The Group
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
The progress of 5 people in an intensive group socialisation therapy in a London psychiatric hospital. The film is useful for training of psychologists, group therapists and social workers

results.title: The Demonstration
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
An award-winning episode of the ‘World in Action’ series observing the mass protest at the U.S. embassy in London against the bombing of North Vietnam. Interviews students travelling to the rally, police preparing for the confrontation and members of the public expressing their support or opposition to the event. Captures the violent clashes between police and the crowd and records the media coverage that was transmitted by American reporters.
results.description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
An award-winning episode of the ‘World in Action’ series observing the mass protest at the U.S. embassy in London against the bombing of North Vietnam. Interviews students travelling to the rally, police preparing for the confrontation and members of the public expressing their support or opposition to the event. Captures the violent clashes between police and the crowd and records the media coverage that was transmitted by American reporters.

results.title: Wonders of the deep
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
A record of research and achievement in the technique of underwater photography. Brings to the screen new secrets of the sea and shows the methods by which cine film can be taken in the ocean at depths down to 100 feet by a mobile cameraman wearing self-contained diving equipment.
results.description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.

results.title: Living dangerously
results.creator_credit: Alan Segal and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
Reports on the explosion of a chemical factory in Seveso, Italy and the effects of the extremely toxic dust, dioxin, that was released into the atmosphere. The substance dioxin is contained in commercial weedkillers freely available in the United Kingdom.
results.description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
